content:
Not really troubleshooting... but trying to understand.
Can I set my "MaxFileUploadSizeInBytes" to something very large now that we have S3 and direct uploads?

Will the UI software and all the "things" not get in the way - time out, etc. for large files? Before direct upload was a thing, 2GB was what was suggested as a setting. So that low "limit" isn't necessary now if we have direct uploads?
Try it and see! :grinning:
